casebody.data:
Re: State
v.
Mario Andrette McNeill 446A13-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 13, 2016

Mr. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Mr. Andrew DeSimone, Mr. Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defenders, Mr. G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, For McNeill, Mario Andrette

Mr. Robert C. Montgomery, Ms. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Mr. William West, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 9th of June 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of June 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 15th day of August 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
